reporting-org.narrative: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy

description.narrative: The project will develop a sustainable solution that will support BFAR with the identification of IUU fishing and management of fisheries to end overfishingin Philippine watersand make the national fishing grounds more sustainable and productive in the long term.The country has a population of some 104 million people. 93% of fish caught in the country are consumed domestically, with Filipinos eating on average 39kgs of seafood per person per year, equal to about 56% of their total animal protein intake. But it is not enough, and increasing the supply of affordable edible fish is important for improved nutrition and food security.
